subtitleNullable: The dataset contains sensex index indicators data from 2/6/2017.
descriptionNullable:
## **To get latest scraped technical data of any index/stock refer to code section and run the notebook**
The dataset contains data of various indicators like rsi,macd,cci etc. of sensex indicator of BSE from date 2/6/2017. This dataset is very useful for technical analysis .
The data is scrapped using python bs4 module.
The website from data scrapped is `https://www.traderscockpit.com/?pageView=stochastic-oscillator&type=stoch&symbol=BSE`
Be free to visit above website and scrape the data.

The file is csv file and about 96 KiB.

#**Column Info**

index - Index of each row starts from 0 to 1300.
data - The date format is Month/Day/Year
psar_trend - The fundamental purpose of the PSAR indicator is to determine trend direction.
adx_indicator - ADX quantifies the velocity of price regardless of its north/south/eastward movement.
adx_plus_di - Positive Directional Indicator (+DI)
adx_minus_di - Negative Directional Indicator (-DI)
rsi - The RSI provides a relative evaluation of the strength of a security's recent price performance, thus making it a momentum indicator. RSI values range from 0 to 100.
macd - Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) is defined as a trend-following momentum indicator that shows the relationship between two moving averages of a security's price.
macd_exp - A macd line
macd_histogram - MACD Histogram Helps Determine Trend Changes.
mfi - The Money Flow Index indicator (MFI) is a tool used in technical analysis for measuring buying and selling pressure. This is done through analyzing both price and volume. The MFI's calculation generates a value that is then plotted as a line that moves within a range of 0-100, making it an oscillator.
cci_oscillator - he Commodity Channel Index​ (CCI) is a momentum-based oscillator used to help determine when an investment vehicle is reaching a condition of being overbought or oversold.
william_%r - Williams %R, also known as the Williams Percent Range, is a type of momentum indicator that moves between 0 and -100 and measures overbought and oversold levels. 
bollinger_upper_band - Upper line defines resistance
middle_band - Middle line defines trend
bollinger_lower_band - Lower line defines support
stochastic_slow_k - The slow stochastic indicator is a technical momentum indicator that aims to measure the trend in prices and identify trend reversals.
stochastic_slow_d - The slow stochastic indicator is a technical momentum indicator that aims to measure the trend in prices and identify trend reversals.
title: SENSEX-30 Technical Indicators Dataset
